resources.string:
Information for new users:

The purpose of this app is the organization and display of eye photos. On first usage, you need to do the following:

1. Define an incoming folder for new eye photos and copy all your existing eye photos into this folder

2. Configure this folder as "Input folder" in the settings (first entry).

3. Assign these photos to persons and dates and shift them to the app's eye photo folder, using the "Organize new photos" functionality.

After this preparation, you can use the "Display photos" functionality to view and analyze your photos.

On most pages of the app you find a question mark on the top right corner - here you can access the help page.

Important remark: This app modifies your JPG files in a non-destructive way, in order to store metadata within the files. This has the advantage that all such information is still available if you copy the pictures from one device to another one. To some extent, information like comments will be even available when viewing the files in MS Windows. However, this kind of storage imposes a small risk. It may happen that on some devices, or for pictures from some cameras, storing information in the JPG fails, or possibly even destroys the JPG file. Therefore, it is recommended that you keep backups of your JPG files when using the app for the first time with a new device or with a new camera. Please inform me if such problems appear.
